title: Stealth
content:
Stealth Main Attribute Dexterity

Stealth is a Skill in Baldur's Gate 3. Stealth is a Dexterity skill. Skills represent a specific aspect of an ability score, and an individual’s proficiency in a skill demonstrates a focus on that aspect.

Stealth Information

Stealth is a Dexterity Skill. Make a Dexterity (Stealth) check when you attempt to conceal yourself from enemies, slink past guards, slip away without being noticed, or sneak up on someone without being seen or heard

How to Increase Stealth

The following classes can select Stealth as a class skill: Bard, Monk, Ranger, Rogue The following Backgrounds provide the Stealth proficiency: Criminal, Urchin

Bard, Monk, Ranger, Rogue

Criminal, Urchin

Stealth Tips & Notes

While sneaking, stealth checks are called if a character enters an NPC's vision cone, displayed in red. Stealth checks are repeated every few seconds (or every turn, if in turn-based mode) while remaining inside the vision cone. Other notes and tips go here.
